title: Track Your Spending
content: Record your expenses to understand where your money goes and identify areas to cut back.

title: Set a Monthly Budget
content: Establish a realistic monthly budget to manage your income and expenses effectively.

title: Save Before You Spend
content: Pay yourself first by saving a portion of your income before spending on other things.

title: Avoid Unnecessary Debt
content: Only borrow what you can afford to repay and avoid high-interest debt like credit cards.

title: Plan for Emergencies
content: Build an emergency fund to cover unexpected expenses like car repairs or medical bills.
